# configuration

**Instance Property**

An object that customizes the look of the paste button.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var configuration: UIPasteControl.Configuration { get }
```

## Determining the button’s look

- **UIPasteControl.Configuration**: An object that determines a paste button’s color, corner style, icon, and text.
